item.title: quizme: An R Package to Create and Practice Any Learning Material
item.description: While writing code for our project, we often learn new functions and concepts. Unfortunately, we also forget the new knowledge quickly. Some of you might be lucky and remember the first time you read something. For the rest of us, we need deliberate practice. Wouldnâ€™t it be nice if we could practice any new material so we can recall it with ease? I have created a package, quizme, that can help you with that practice.
